document.full_text: the hearing was postponed to give prosecutors time to consider whether to retry the home run king and allowing bonds's lawyers time to sharpen their arguments for throwing out the lone conviction.
document.title: bonds' post-trial conference delayed until june 17
lines_and_colors: the hearing was postponed to give prosecutors time to consider whether to retry the home run king and allowing bonds's lawyers time to sharpen their arguments for throwing out the lone conviction.
